name: Byproduct
description:
Survive weird monsters living in the sewers. What the backstory ? Guess we'll never know.

After following some tutorials on Youtube, I thought making game it quite easy. So I decided to make a full game by myself in a week. It took me almost 2 month.

＼(º □ º l|l)/

Controls

  • Left/Right or A/D - Move
  • Z/K - Shoot
  • X/L - Dash
  • Combine W/Up + Z/K - Shoot Up
